overview:
Andre has more than 20 years of leadership experience in software companies providing solutions to the semiconductor, solar, insurance, medical, real-estate, mobile and advertising markets. Andre founded Mixberry Media, Inc. in 2011, the first real-time, on demand global voice & audio ad network.

Prior to Mixberry Media, Andre founded gSoft Technology Solutions building and marketing business and productivity applications for smart devices focusing on voice interface, AI and rich content.

In 1991, Andre founded IDS Software Systems, Inc., the most comprehensive platform-independent set of yield management systems (YMS), which he then sold in 2003 for $51 million.

Andre’s breadth of international experience, vision, knowledge and inspirational management skills allow him to see an opportunity and create a breakthrough.

Hawit has extensive international experience working directly with top management of global companies in 32 countries including Intel, Philips, Sony, Toshiba, Motorola, Cisco, TSMC, Qualcomm, Samsung, TI, Apple, Microsoft, etc.
